themes: Perceived exclusion of African American artists from funding and venues
Displacement of African American communities in East Austin
Misrepresentation of service to marginalized groups by white artists and organizations
Accusations of unfair and discriminatory funding practices
Use of language to obscure inequities in funding
key_phrases: others are excluded from funding and venues
African American artists aren't given the same access to funding and opportunities
majority of African-Americans have been displaced from their community in East Austin
White Artists and culture groups in East Austin use the term undeserved and displaced people in order to get funding even though they don't serve anyone in those groups
funding is very unfair and discriminatory towards African-Americans
the city and other groups try to hide it by using select terms to claim they're serving the excluded people
barriers_identified: Exclusion from funding and venues for African American artists
Misuse of funding criteria by organizations not serving marginalized groups
